description: Retrieve the details for the specified policy template in the specified policy store.

parameters.name: policyStoreId
parameters.description: Specifies the ID of the policy store that contains the policy template that you want information about.

parameters.name: policyTemplateId
parameters.description: Specifies the ID of the policy template that you want information about.

nested_items.name: policyStoreId
nested_items.description: The ID of the policy store that contains the policy template.

nested_items.name: policyTemplateId
nested_items.description: The ID of the policy template.

nested_items.name: description
nested_items.description: The description of the policy template.

nested_items.name: statement
nested_items.description: The content of the body of the policy template written in the Cedar policy language.

nested_items.name: createdDate
nested_items.description: The date and time that the policy template was originally created.

nested_items.name: lastUpdatedDate
nested_items.description: The date and time that the policy template was most recently updated.
